titles.title: We wish you a merry Christmas

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Good tidings we bring
to you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, bring us some figgy pudding
Oh, bring us some figgy pudding
Oh, bring us some figgy pudding
And bring it right here

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Good tidings we bring
to you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We won't go until we get some
We won't go until we get some
We won't go until we get some
So bring it right here

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Good tidings we bring
to you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We all like our figgy pudding
We all like our figgy pudding
We all like our figgy pudding
With all its good cheers

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Good tidings we bring
to you and your kin
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
We wish you a merry Christmas
and a happy new year
